summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the north side of East Spring Street, from Sixteenth Avenue to Seventeenth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 731 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
